attributes.action: allow pets into the house of commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see these grumpy middle age men lighten up a bit in the house of commons and i feel the best way to do this is to give them some pets for example a few puppies not only will government owned pets be allowed but mp's will be able to take thier own pets along

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
